description: Triangle of B-analogs of Stirling numbers of first kind.
comments: Triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by [1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, ...] DELTA [ -1, -2, -3, -4, -5, -6, -7, -8, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938 . - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Aug 08 2005
links: R. Suter, Two analogues of a classical sequence, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 3 (2000), #P00.1.8.
author: Ruedi Suter (suter(AT)math.ethz.ch)
